questions.question: What is the dominant color of the visible fabric surface?
What is the apparent texture of the material, based on visual observation?
Considering the image's visual features, what is the main apparent fiber type?
Based on the visible surface, what is the general perceived feel of the fabric?
Observing the image, what is the general directional pattern of the fabric's texture?
Judging from the image, how would you describe the overall visual sheen of the fabric?
What is the apparent level of transparency observed in the fabric shown?
If considering the image alone, does the fabric display noticeable piling?
From the image, is there an evident pattern or print on the fabric's surface?
Based on visual analysis of the image, is the fabric's weave visibly tight or loose?
What is the predominant visual directionality of the fabric's brushed texture?
Considering visual details, how would you describe the fabric's weight?
Does the image show any noticeable irregularities in the fabric's texture?
Based solely on visual assessment, how uniform is the fabric's color?
Judging from the visual evidence, is the material heavily textured or relatively plain?
